dc:title: Review of 'Weaving:The Art and Craft of Hand Weaving'
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Review of a book on hand weaving. Discusses spinning and weaving engaged in by herself, her daughter Tamar and friends. Says using our hands is a way to discover the sacramentality of things.
